*/export default function sidenavLogoLabel(theme,ownerState){const{functions,transitions,typography,breakpoints}=theme;const{miniSidenav}=ownerState;const{pxToRem}=functions;const{fontWeightMedium}=typography;return{ml:0.5,fontWeight:fontWeightMedium,wordSpacing:pxToRem(-1),transition:transitions.create("opacity",{easing:transitions.easing.easeInOut,duration:transitions.duration.standard}),[breakpoints.up("xl")]:{opacity:miniSidenav?0:1}};}
